hotels.title: Arabian Beachfront Oasis with Seven Onsite Restaurants & Bars
hotels.description: Step into a tranquil ocean paradise with a stay at Crowne Plaza Hotels & Resorts Salalah, an IHG Hotel - a palm-tree-covered oasis on the banks of the Arabian Sea. Salalah is a colourful city home to breathtaking cultural landmarks. This sub-tropical haven is the perfect vacation for groups of friends and families wanting to spend their days lounging by the pools, soaking up some sunshine on the pristine beaches and indulging in spectacular dining at the seven onsite restaurants and bars.
